price: Warri ibiddaafi warri Jannataa wal hin qixxaatan. Warri Jannataa isaanumatu milkaa'oodha.
arabic: لَا يَسۡتَوِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِۚ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yastawī aṣḥābu al-nāri wa-aṣḥābu al-janati aṣḥābu al-janati humu al-fāizūna
